text: Philippe-Armand Martin (born April 28, 1949 in Cumières) is a French politician, a member of the National Assembly. He represents the Marne department,http://www.assemblee-nationale.fr/13/tribun/fiches_id/2098.asp and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:People from Marne (department) Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Gaullism, a way forward for France Category:MEPs for France 1994–1999 Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Philippe-Armand Martin
